issue.title: [Archery] Consider to use archery with or instead of the pre-commit hooks
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7144](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7144). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Archery lint has most of the configured functionality in the pre-commit hooks except to check only the changed and relevant paths.
